# Basic Features of the Nervous System
### The Meninges.

.pull-left[
### (brain) ![:color blue](P) ![:color green](A) ![:color red](D)

#### Meninges: protective sheath around brain & spinal cord
- ![:color red](Dura Mater)
    - Tough, flexible outermost meninx (i.e., toughest-outermost layer)
- ![:color green](Arachnoid Membrane)
    - Middle layer of the meninges
- ![:color blue](Pia Mater)
    - Last layer of the meninges, which adheres to the surface of the brain
